original_text: Then Jael Heber's wife took a nail of the tent, and took an hammer in her hand, and went softly unto him, and smote the nail into his temples, and fastened it into the ground: for he was fast asleep and weary. So he died.
korean_text: 그가 깊이 잠드니 헤벨의 아내 야엘이 장막 말뚝을 가지고 손에 방망이를 들고 그에게로 가만히 가서 말뚝을 그의 관자놀이에 박으매 말뚝이 꿰뚫고 땅에 박히니 그가 기절하여 죽으니라

sentences.original_text: Then Jael Heber's wife took a nail of the tent
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 야엘 헤버의 아내가 장막의 말뚝을 가져다가

sentences.original_text: and took an hammer in her hand
and smote the nail into his temples
and fastened it into the ground
for he was fast asleep and weary
